stochastic_function: lambda weather_outcome: {'rain': 0.9 if weather_outcome == 'rain' else 0.4, 'no rain': 1 - (0.9 if weather_outcome == 'rain' else 0.4)}

lambda carry_umbrella_decision, weather_outcome: {0.0: 1.0 if (carry_umbrella_decision == 'not carry' and weather_outcome == 'rain') else 0.0, -2.0: 1.0 if carry_umbrella_decision == 'carry' else 0.0, -25.0: 1.0 if (carry_umbrella_decision == 'not carry' and weather_outcome == 'no rain') else 0.0}
